summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4879 for the improvement of 23rd Avenue Southwest, from West Spokane Street to Youngstown Place; by constructing concrete sidewalks, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55954, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
